attributes.additional_details: The NHS have gone above and beyond this year with the fight against COVID-19. It’s too easy to stand at the front door and clap. But what better way to say thank you than making sure all NHS staff get the pay rise they deserve
attributes.background: Deduct every worker aged between 18-60 50p a week to put money back into the NHS for pay rises and support

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356

If you want the Government to create a new tax to fund pay rises for NHS by creating a new tax you could start a petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear from the title of your petition that this is what you want to happen.
